text:
may be a copy of a 
scan picture. If you have a late 
miscarriage, you may be able to 
see and hold your baby if you 
wish. You might also be able to 
take photographs, footprints 
and handprints as a keepsake. 
Some	hospitals	offer	parents	
a	certificate	to	commemorate	
their baby. This is done because 
there is no formal registration 
of a baby who dies before 24 
weeks of pregnancy.
Try to talk about your feelings 
with your partner and those 
close to you. You might 
also want to contact the
